text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Trump dropped the ball on covid-19 from the beginning. He was unprepared, had no pandemic team in place and now the US has the highest number of covid cases in the world.  Nothing to be celebrated about this man and you are providing false information. Status quo for the US.
